tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Fantastic Diagnosis, and Very Very Clean and Hygienic..!! 

Doctor Modi’s expertise and compassionate approach make every visit a positive experience even for someone who is scared of dentist visits. If you’re looking for top notch dental care, Dr. Modi’s practice is the place to go. Exceptional care and comfort and diagnosis.
Dr Manu Modi is a very generous and understanding person and his speech is very comfortable and he is a Very Warm person
Very good but expensive. Clean clinic. Efficient and friendly staff. I recommend this if you are willing to pay for his services.

I was satisfied initially with my teeth treatment and teeth whitening. The doctors are friendly and agreeable. They helped me navigate through the entire process. I wish the treatment was a bit more cost effective. However, overall it was a satisfactory experience. I can smile with confidence, thanks to Mr. And Ms. Modi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The experience was highly satisfactory. I strongly endorse it.

It was really good. I highly recommend it.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Absolutely pathetic *** * ***** ********* ************ **** **** ***** ** *** **** ** ********* ******** ** * ********** I went for pain in my wisdom tooth as it was unbearable for the last 3 days *** ** *** * ***** ********* *** *** ***** ***** ** ***** Before even starting the treatment, they immediately asked to pay ₹2000 (1000 visit + 1000 for X-ray). * *** ** **** ***** *** *** ******** ** *** **** *** *** ** ******* ******** ** *** ******* ***** *** *** ***** *** ****** ********* *** **** *** ** ****** ******** *** ******** ****** * ****** ** *********** *** *********** ** ******** However, the attending was not ready to do any cleaning and only prescribed some Medicines which I was already taking for the last 3 days with absolutely no relief. It’s only when my husband argued and insisted that the tooth be cleaned before any medication be started did the doctor do some flossing. And guess what, I felt instant relief once the tooth was flossed and pus punctured. Now, the infection would heal in 2-3 days. It (tooth flossing and cleaning) was hardly a 5 minute job and should have the first practice before any x-ray was even required. We had to haggle, argue hard and practically guided the doctor on duty on what line of treatment is required and the approach towards it. And on top of it, we had to pay ₹2000 for this 5 minute thing and on top of that, the lady at the reception was ready to charge us another ₹5500 in the name of tooth cleaning. This was a very bad  experience ever with a dentist. Absolutely not recommended!
reply_text: The doctor waited for the concerned patient for nearly two hours ‘foregoing the lunch ‘   And did whatsoever was needed ‘ but instead of being thankful ‘ here in this society’ freedom of expression means freedom to write anything ,,,,,,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Manu Modi is an expert doctor   Had a comfortable and relaxing experience through out my dental treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Dental Cavity Filling, Teeth cleaning & polishing,
review: Dr. Manu Modi and his team of doctors are very experienced and friendly in nature. We had decided to visit India for my son's treatment because my wife and her family had very good experience with him over past 2 decades. Dr. Modi explained us very well the current state of my 5 year old son's teeth and probable reasons for cavities. He also explained us what to expect in coming years in respect to his milk teeth and how to take care of his teeth. *** **** ** **** ************* *** ** *** **** ***** accomodates the requests of his patients. I believe the quality of treatment received at the clinic justifies the cost of services paid, since as a patient anybody would want their experience to be "short simple and sweet" as in Doctor's own words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Our experience at Dr Modi's clinic has been nothing short of outstanding! My mom was in acute pain and needed urgent help. We approached Dr Modi who calmed our nerves and handled the difficult case of my mom with great precision. My mom is a senior citizen and a diabetic; Cognizant of these facts Dr Modi's team worked day in and day out to ensure smooth and painless treatment of my mom. There were no less than 7 implants required and Dr Modi went out of his way to provide comfort to mom. The support staff is also extremely friendly and sensitive. The infrastructure is modern and the latest available technology is used to treat the patients. I would like to add that the ambiance itself is very calming.

review: *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ******* He is very professional and most updated. Uses the latest and most sophisticated tools and technologies for the treatment of issues related to dental treatment.  His charges and fees  may not be on the lower side but it is reasonable considering the quality of treatment and high standards he maintains.. He is very friendly ,accessible and gives unbiased advice. I would strongly recommend him.

Doctor is good. But the ortho doesn’t visit the clinic daily which creates a hassle because the ortho is only available on certain number of days in a week. 
Also, the receptionist has often given wrong info about the doctor whether he will be available on a particular day or not. It has delayed my treatment a lot.

Dr. Manu Modi is one of the finest talks with politeness with everyone young or old. I have been visiting him with my family since a very long time. My only suggestion is to give some sort of discount to senior citizens like Hospital Fortis Gurgaon does no matter what you have gone for....

Not recommended.I Visited to be checked by Dr. Modi, upon arrival I wasn't informed that Dr. Modi is not in the clinic ( asked the receptionist too ) and was examined by an assistant Doctor. when asked about the availability of Dr. Modi, the assistant doctor started arguing, creating a heck of a situation.* **** ****** ******** ** *** **** **** * *** * *** *** ****** ** ************ ***** ** ** *** **** *** * ************ ** **** *** ** *** * *** **** ***** ** * *** ** ********** ******* ** ***** *** ***** ******

review: My association with Dr. Modi is from last 4 years and I am very satisfied with the treatment I had undergone. The doctor as well as entire staff is professional and humble. The best thing is the treatment which needs to be done is discussed in detail with the patient thereby, ending the anxiety of the patient and at the same time making comfortable so that the entire procedure can be carried on smoothly. I would recommend Dr. Modi for every dental treatment.

Very nice doctor,who picked up my problem and explained me in detail as why I'm having receeding problem. I'm feeling little bit fine , however my treatment is going on. Dr. Modi treats with smile and is a very humble personality. Nice to be here. My daughter Rita Rana and my my wife Narinder Rana have already experienced the treatments at your clinic and it is quite satisfactory. I wish you all the best.

DR. MODI IS VERY COURTEOUS & A THROUOGH GENTLEMAN. HE IS A TRUE PROFESSIONAL & HE TREATS HIS PATIENT VERY WELL. AT THE END OF THE DAY, I HAVE SEEN ALMOST 100% PATIENTS COME SMILING FROM HIS CLINIC. As regards, his trainee doctors, they are a bit hasty & try to finish the job fast, very fast which sometime does not yield good results. Overall, excellent clinic & treatment.

He is excellent doctor n so humble kind n thorough gentlemen. He is best dentist and I recommend all to visit him for any dental problem and he is not at all money minded n very helpful.
